name: Headlong
content: Try to hold my head up high
And whenever I lose myself in disbelief
Then I got you on my mind
'Til the fire in my heart is gone
'Til the fire in my heart is gone
'Til the fire in my heart is gone
'Til the fire in my heart is gone
Try to hold my head up high
And whenever I lose myself in disbelief
Then I got you on my mind
'Til the fire in my heart is gone
'Til the fire in my heart is gone
'Til the fire in my heart is gone
